key_risks: Market volatility due to unpredictable global energy prices
Regulatory challenges from evolving environmental and carbon emission standards
Dependence on fossil fuels despite renewable energy efforts
Geopolitical risks from operating in over 60 countries
Environmental scrutiny and pressure to reduce environmental footprint
controversies: Criticism for heavy reliance on traditional fuel distribution
Pressure to meet ambitious environmental goals and maintain stakeholder trust
environmental_issues: High carbon footprint due to fossil fuel distribution
Need to comply with increasing environmental regulations
social_issues: Pressure to align with global sustainability priorities
Need to maintain stakeholder trust in sustainability efforts
governance_issues: Compliance risks with U.S. and international laws
Need for strong anti-corruption measures and governance practices
